resources.string: If a query arrives by a push notification or SMS, program will answer it. It will turn on GPS, get your position and send it to an asking device by a push or SMS. Evrybody will know where are you.
If a query arrives by a push notification or SMS, program will ignore it. Like if you uninstall the application.
If a query arrives by a push notification or SMS, program will reply, that it will not send your position. Everyone may know that you have that application working but nobody will get you position.
